channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Comcast tops earnings estimates as Olympics propel the company
item.description: Comcast beat third-quarter earnings estimates as the Summer Olympics in Paris boosted NBCUniversal’s revenue and Peacock’s subscriber count.

item.title: Big Tech Is Paving the Way for a Nuclear Breakthrough
item.description: Small modular reactors could eventually make the power source cheaper, safer and faster to build.

item.title: Merck tops earnings estimates on strong demand for Keytruda, new drugs even as HPV vaccine sales fall
item.description: The company saw strong sales from its top-selling cancer drug Keytruda, recently launched treatments and its animal health business.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Inventories Rise By 78 Bcf
item.description: Natural gas futures fell further after data showed a build in U.S. inventories that was close to expectations.

item.title: That Actively Managed Mutual Fund You're Paying For? It's Looking Pretty Passive
item.description: Over the past 50 years or so, active funds’ returns have converged toward those of their underlying indexes, research finds. Small-cap funds are the e...

item.title: Beaten-up Nextracker provides investors a reason to believe. But timing is key here
item.description: Shares of Nextracker jumped 22% on the back of stronger-than-expected results and an increase to its project backlog.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Fall; Meta, Microsoft Sell Off
item.description: U.S. stocks traded lower, with the tech-heavy Nasdaq leading the way down as earnings season for Big Tech rolls on.

item.title: Sterling Could Rise Further on Prospects of Moderate BOE Rate Cuts
item.description: Sterling was a touch higher against the dollar and UBS said relatively higher U.K. interest rates compared with rates elsewhere, should favor the poun...

item.title: Uber reports third-quarter results that beat Wall Street's revenue expectations
item.description: Uber reported third-quarter results Thursday that beat analysts' expectations for revenue.

item.title: Bristol Myers Squibb tops earnings estimates and hikes outlook, helped by Eliquis and new drugs
item.description: The pharmaceutical giant also raised its full-year revenue forecast to an increase of roughly 5%.
